title: Add transparent mega menu with holographic effects to header

requirements.summary: Make header navigation transparent with backdrop blur effect while maintaining readability
acceptanceCriteria: Header has transparent background with backdrop-blur CSS property
Navigation remains readable over different background content

file_operations.description: Update the header element to use transparent background with backdrop-blur CSS. Replace the solid background classes with transparent background and backdrop-blur-md. Ensure the header maintains sticky positioning and readability with appropriate text contrast adjustments.
Add custom CSS utilities or layer styles if needed to support the transparent header with backdrop blur effect, ensuring proper browser compatibility and fallback styles.

requirements.summary: Transform header navigation into mega menu with expandable dropdown panels on hover
acceptanceCriteria: Main navigation items trigger mega menu panels on hover
Mega menu panels display in multi-column layout below the header
Panels include relevant links and content for each navigation section
Smooth transitions when opening and closing mega menu panels
Mobile-responsive behavior that collapses to accordion or drawer

file_operations.description: Create a new MegaMenu component that renders expandable dropdown panels for main navigation items (Home, Products, Cart). Implement hover trigger logic with multi-column layout support. Include smooth transitions for panel opening/closing. Structure panels to contain relevant links, descriptions, and promotional content for each navigation section. Ensure mobile-responsive behavior with accordion or drawer collapse.

Integrate the MegaMenu component into the Layout header navigation. Replace or enhance the existing navigation links (Home, Products, Cart) to work with the mega menu system. Wire the MegaMenu component into the desktop navigation structure while preserving the existing mobile menu functionality. Maintain the theme-aware TS Gabrielle logo and cart icon with item count badge.
Create a custom hook to manage mega menu state including open/close state, active panel tracking, hover delay logic, and keyboard navigation support. Handle transition timing and cleanup.

requirements.summary: Apply holographic gradient effects to header navigation elements including links and cart icon
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links display holographic gradient borders on hover
Cart icon has animated holographic border effect
Effects use brand color #a932bd as part of the gradient
Animations are smooth and match existing holographic effects elsewhere
Effects remain visible against the transparent header background

file_operations.description: Add holographic gradient effects to navigation links and the cart icon. Implement animated gradient borders on hover for nav links and an animated holographic border effect on the cart icon. Use brand color #a932bd as part of the gradient. Ensure effects are visible against the transparent header background and match the existing holographic styling on product cards and buttons throughout the site.

Add CSS keyframe animations and gradient definitions for holographic effects on header navigation elements. Define iridescent shimmer animations featuring the brand color #a932bd that coordinate with existing holographic effects. Include responsive considerations to ensure effects work with the transparent backdrop-blur header.

requirements.summary: Add holographic gradient effects to mega menu dropdown panels
acceptanceCriteria: Mega menu panels have holographic gradient borders
Panel backgrounds feature subtle iridescent gradients
Effects coordinate with header transparency and backdrop blur
Visual style matches existing holographic effects throughout the site

file_operations.description: Apply holographic gradient effects to the mega menu dropdown panels. Add iridescent borders around panel containers and subtle holographic background gradients. Ensure effects coordinate with the transparent header and backdrop blur, creating visual cohesion with the vanguardist design aesthetic. Match the visual style of existing holographic effects on product cards, buttons, and headings.

Add CSS styles for mega menu panel holographic effects including gradient border definitions, iridescent background gradients, and animations. Ensure styles integrate seamlessly with the transparent header backdrop and existing holographic effect system. Use brand color #a932bd as part of the gradient palette.
